definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: There exists a close relationship between plants and chiral compounds.
sentences.chinese: 植物与手性化合物存在着非常密切的联系。

sentences.english: The advantages and disadvantages of different polymer-based Chiral stationary phases are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 重点介绍了手性聚合物固定相的分类和应用的新进展。

sentences.english: Such a carbon is designated as a chiral carbon.
sentences.chinese: 这样的碳原子称为手性碳。

sentences.english: Superchiral light could even aid the search for extraterrestrial life.
sentences.chinese: 超手性光束还可能有助于寻找外星生命。

sentences.english: Chirality enhances the character of electromagnetic wave-absorption of carbon nanotubes distinctly.
sentences.chinese: 碳纳米管的手性明显增强了材料的吸波性能。

sentences.english: Conclusion This method is convenient, rapid, accurate, economic and suitable for the determination of chiral impurity in the S-zopiclone.
sentences.chinese: 结论可用于右旋佐匹克隆中手性杂质的含量测定。

sentences.english: In this paper, these methods for the preparation of diltiazem intermediate were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 对地尔硫卓手性中间体的制备方法进行了综述。

sentences.english: Objective To develop a reversed-phase HPLC method so as to determine the chiral impurity content in the S-zopiclone.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立右旋佐匹克隆中手性杂质含量的测定方法。

sentences.english: Enantiomer separation is one of the most important research fields of chiral technology.
sentences.chinese: 手性拆分是手性技术的重要研究方向。

sentences.english: The invention discloses chiral diphosphine ligand, the synthesis method and application thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种手性双磷配体及其合成方法与用途。

sentences.english: Chirality is a fundamental property of the nature.
sentences.chinese: 手性是自然界的本质属性之一。

sentences.english: This review describes the development of chiral diamines in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 综述了手性二胺化学近几年的研究进展。

sentences.english: Objective:Expound chirality with chiral drugs concept and actual meaning of research.
sentences.chinese: 目的阐明手性和药物手性的概念及其研究的实际意义。

sentences.english: Objective:Expound chirality with chiral drugs concept and actual meaning of research.
sentences.chinese: 目的阐明手性和药物手性的概念及其研究的实际意义。

sentences.english: Chiral micelle has asymmetric induction to some reactions.
sentences.chinese: 手性胶束对反应有手性诱导作用。

sentences.english: They are all chiral molecules and belong in the racemate.
sentences.chinese: 它们都是手性分子，属于外消旋体。
